comments.body: Can we rename it to something like `InMemoryPackageStore`? It's not really related to Sandbox itself.

I should probably also move it from `com.digitalasset.platform.sandbox.damle` to a better place. 

How about `com.digitalasset.platform.sandbox.stores.ledger.inmemory`, along with `ActiveContractsInMemory` (which should be renamed to `InMemoryActiveContracts`)?

diffHunk:
